Vanessa Pereira


7+ years working on electronic health records specifications and functional analysis, with international experience.
Possess a MSc in Medical Informatics by FMUP.

Currently working as
- Digital health engineer @Luxembourg Institute of Health.
- Consultant & clinical data modeller @Better.

"The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud."

I believe quality and well structured health data saves lifes. And I fight for it, everyday.

Profissional

Currently I am working with various costumers from England, France, Slovenia, Netherlands, Brazil, Scotland, Luxembourg, Germany, New Zealand and Portugal.

Stack I develop and use in my daily basis:

Products
